alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Lamoille; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A wintry mix will continue to impact portions of southeastern Lamoille, northwestern Orange, southwestern Caledonia and Washington Counties at least through 915 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, a wintry mix has been reported and is creating slick road surfaces. HAZARD...Wintry mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Mixed precipitation covering untreated surfaces with snow, sleet, and freezing rain will be hazardous for motorists and pedestrians. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Calais, Braintree Hill, Plainfield, Waterbury Village, Websterville, East Montpelier, Marshfield Village, Waitsfield, Berlin, Fayston, Worcester, Middlesex, Marshfield, Cabot Village, Barre Town, Northfield Village, Woodbury and Cabot. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 34 and 64.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
